titles.title: Who are these which are arrayed in white robes?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who are these which are arrayed in white robes?
Who are these and from where do they come?
These are they who came out, (2x)
These are they who came out of great tribulation,
And they have washed their robes and made them white, (2x)
They have washed their robes,
And made them white
In the blood of the Lamb.
